website_summaries.verdict: An effective CC cream that customers keep coming back to.
pros: Effectively evens out skin tone while still looking natural
Sunscreen scent is subtle, not overpowering
Feels light on your skin and doesn’t settle into pores
cons: Can feel greasy on those with oily skin types

customer_reviews.title: Light coverage but not full war paint!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I, like many have used Olay for years. Some of us remember back to the 70’s! Anyway, this is a new product for me as I have usually used the regular serum for my daily ritual. I like the way this goes on especially on my neck as it evens out some imperfections in that 60 year old zip code. I tan easily in the summer, so I like a bit of color but not too much. It does not cover my under eye circles, so I still have to do makeup if I want full coverage. But overall, better than just serum but not as full coverage as a base. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Ballousmom

customer_reviews.title: Bring back “fair to light” color Choice
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting fair to light to replace what I was using but as I opened & used it was very disappointed to see ORANGE on my face. Have since seen other comments & joined many other dissatisfied users who hope fair to light is returned. Am currently looking for replacement product. Anyone who finds one spread the word.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy D.

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest Gift for your Skin!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! I'm struggling with winter dry skin that's lighter than usual. I could not believe how this minimized my pores and evened out my skin. I am in awe of this product!! I am switching my make up routine to be more natural, less full coverage foundation, so this fit the bill. This product works wonders for my combination skin. It feels like the "spanx" for your skin because it buffs out any acne scars, redness, and dullness. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Orejel

customer_reviews.title: Light moisturizer with just a little color to tone down red and uneven skin tone.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for years. I’m 59 and don’t like to wear my full coverage Estée Lauder Double Wear on the weekends or when i don’t have to dress up. I use this as my under foundation moisturizer 7 days a week, and use it alone on weekends. It’s light, easy to smooth on, has SPF and tones down the red tones and blotchiness just enough. I’ve tried a lot of other moisturizers but it his is my favorite because it has SPF and a hint of coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B

customer_reviews.title: WHAT is this?
customer_reviews.text: I love O of O and this appeared to be a good idea - a combination moisturizer/foundation - that's what it looks like. But no. It's not either of those things. It's very greasy, leaves your face very shiny, and has absolutely no foundation coverage whatsoever. Please don't waste your money on this. Just dab a little of your moisturizer on your face along with your foundation and use that instead of wasting your money on this ridiculous product.
customer_reviews.author: mallory0405

customer_reviews.title: Have beautiful skin and save money!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. Ole delivers y definitely delivers what they promise in their descriptions of what their products do. I am 50 years old and people often think that I am 30 something. I've been using Olay products since I was in my twenties. They are worth the small price tag and work well!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, nice, nice. After having oily skin my entire life, I didn't know how to handle suddenly having dry skin and using makeup. Everything I used before and tried would just settle into my pores. My coworker recommended this. Worked beautifully instantly. Just enough moisture, adds a nice color to my skin, good coverage, I use less concealer, and it has sun protection. I can't say enough about it.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a time saver on busy mornings, only one thing to slather on my face. But... there was an earlier version that I liked better, this one feels a little grainy, and the tall thin bottle gets knocked over easily. If the price doesn't come down I won't be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Janey Bee

customer_reviews.title: Orange
customer_reviews.text: Light to medium is Orange ! I am Caucasian with light/mediumish skin tone and buy light to medium in Covergirl BB smoothers tinted moisturizer and it’s perfect . I figure I would try something new and wow what a waste ! It looks as tho it oxidizes . If I get fair to light in anything it’s too light for me . This is just plain orange . I was thinking maybe my mother-in-law can use it as she’s Hispanic with a deeper skin tone but no , this is just too orange ...
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Only Olay product I don't like
customer_reviews.text: I've always used olay products. I wanted a product to give cover for redness on face. Wrong product for coverage I required. This range makes the skin feel really soft, but had no effect on skin color... still had freckles. The real problem I have is that I got puffy red under eyelids and the cream ran into my eyes... made them sting, water up and go red. I think it might be something in the sunscreen. All I can say is that if you want to have a light coverage, and softer skin... great! Just be careful near the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Susy G

customer_reviews.title: It’s the great pumpkin, Charlie Brown!
customer_reviews.text: If you like orange, this is the one for you! My skin color is in between creamy natural and natural beige. This cc cream is supposed to be light-medium, but it has a very unnatural orange tone. Yuk!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Oil of Olay is exactly what it says it is!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth buying again. I've tried all of the drug store tinted moisturizers & Oil of Olay is the best I've found! Light to medium is works well for light skin & medium as it is slightly buildable. My skin is on the dry side so I like to use my regular moisturizer also. If you have combination skin this will be the right product for you. It looks like your skin but smoother. I was very impressed. It's not heavily scented, if at all. My fine lines & wrinkles are not as defined as if i were wearing foundation. I recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t get the same product as pictured or described.
customer_reviews.text: I would have sworn that it said Fair to Light instead of Light to Medium when I ordered it. I noticed that someone else made the same comment as well. Hmmm. Anyways I tried it just to see and my face looked Orange. And it was clumpy and Cakey. It didn’t even look like the same product that I ordered. I think it was a fake product or expired. I will still buy Olay products, but I don’t think I will be purchasing them online anymore. Because I ordered another Olay product at the same time and had issues with that as well. I’ve been using Olay for years and never had any issues til I ordered these 2 products.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive winter skin
customer_reviews.text: I have mostly oily skin but in the winter I get dry patches on my nose and chin. I was trying to find something that would work to even my skin tone and moisturize without getting clumpy in those dry patches. This worked great. I love the consistency. It definitely doesn’t cover/conceal imperfections it just adds a little tint to help even out redness and dull spots. It goes on a little orange but if you don’t use too much it blends really well. The first couple times I used it I had too much and it was just caking on my face and not blending evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: looks like 1990's self tanner ????!!!
customer_reviews.text: So bummed!.... Just purchased CC cream, light to medium, and it is too dark and even orange on my skin... It actually looks like I put 1990's self tanner on my face 😕😕 Is there a lighter color? Or did I just waste money.....
customer_reviews.author: skm5

customer_reviews.title: Expired.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure the product I was sent had long since expired. It was orange, the consistency was clumpy and the smell was off. I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THICK, THICK, THICK.
customer_reviews.text: My headline says it all. Other Olay products have been very well received, but this tinted moisturizer feels like zinc oxide. Perhaps that is the intent. Just beware that this tinted HEAVY CREAM is too thick for daytime, and will smear all over bed linens were you to wear it for moisturizing at night. Yes, I was trying to be economical and wear it at night since daytime usage was not probable. Sorry OLAY.
customer_reviews.author: Itrainonpulse

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive? DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this through the subscription option last week. Yesterday was the first time I used it. When I woke up this morning my face was on fire. The burning and itching is so bad. I was indoors all day yesterday, so I know it wasn't the sun that caused this. I would say on the sensitive skin level I am just a little bit sensitive and can use most products with no issues. If you are one of those people who get reactions from SPF, DO NOT BUY this! I'm pretty sure that's what caused my rash.
customer_reviews.author: Knot

customer_reviews.title: Smells like sunscreen...
customer_reviews.text: First off the light to medium was way too dark, I had to return this. I also was not a fan of the smell, it has a very strong sunscreen odor. Not the nice, tropical smelling sunscreen either, the straight up sunscreen smell. I will say this is also not the best for sweating, since it does not absorb well it does the beading sweat thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cline Council

customer_reviews.title: Nice CC cream and half the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice CC cream and at half the price. I bought the light to medium. Goes on easily and blends well. Doesn't looked caked on and covers all the imperfections. This is half the price of other CC creams and maybe more than half the price on the big label cc creams. I like Oil of Olay. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen S. Eklund

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an orange tint
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is just "ok" as it leaves a bit of an oily feeling and is definitely tinted orange (you can see it when you wash your hands) It's not terrible, as it does even out the skin tone, but a bit of powder is definitely required to soak up the oily feeling. Won't purchase again but I'll use it til it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very orange
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged but it still works. The color is very orange. I'm Asian with yellow/tan skin and have to put a very light power to tone it down. Just trying to use this stuff up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: I was washing my face about 40 seconds after applying for the first time. I know I have sensitive skin, but I thought od give this a go. I had to return it. I like the concept though
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Warden

customer_reviews.title: too greasy
customer_reviews.text: It had a decent coverage but didn't cover up my redness. Luckily I didn't have any sort of skin reaction to it like I have from other Olay moisturizers unfortunately it was just too heavy and greasy for me. I didn't like the feel of it on my face during the day. I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mraff

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for at least 18 years, maybe more. I don’t want to use makeup so this is a wonderful substitute.. it moisturizes & kind of evens out your skin tone. It doesn’t cover sun damage spots but just gives an overall nice appearance to your face.
customer_reviews.author: dolores3b

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed. Works amazingly. My skin is very happy. The smell is beautiful. It doesnt make my skin feel oily or heavy. The only thing I wish it had an option for other shades. This one was a little darker than my natural asking tone but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: The built-in color with this moisturizer is nice; however
customer_reviews.text: The built-in color with this moisturizer is nice; however, I don't think it works as well for me as the Total Effects Advanced Creamy Face Moisturizer Formula. Come summertime, I'll switch back to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend. It is  rather "drying" on the face.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a few years, so am very familiar with it. This seems either an old product or they are making it more drying. I won't be buying any more and will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Oceans

customer_reviews.title: Favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight moisturizer that absorbs quickly and it's suppose to help aging skin. I think it does help. I used to apply, then foundation. Now I skip that and mix a drop of moisturizer and foundation (Cover Girl) in my hand before applying. It has sunscreen so there some protection everyday, even in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Luciearl

customer_reviews.title: this product was NOT orange
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this product to smell funny or sting. It was not orange-y, either. It is a little darker for my skin so i just use a drop of moisturizer to lighten it up. I use a sunscreen under this, anyhow so i cannot say how the sun protection is.
customer_reviews.author: f.l. g.

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a very oily skin. It doesn't help with my shine at all. I'm on my 60. It doesn't help with my wrinkles nor my skin tone. I love Regenerist whip face cream a lot more. Use this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted mo ey
customer_reviews.text: Does not go on even. It blotches and flakes off. Seems like it is old stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Blends well
customer_reviews.text: This goes on nicely and blends well. My only issue is that there are two colors - light and dark - that come out at the same time but the darker seems to be dominant. Duh I know but I mean the light color doesn't seem to lighten the darker shade. I like it though and it goes one evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I love Olay products and high hopes for this CC cream. However, the color was very orange on my skin and the formula made my eyes burn. I have fairly oily skin and it made me feel wet, so for someone with dry skin this might be perfect. I even gave it another try and put a translucent powder on top, still no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Drew M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It evens out my skin tone and brightens my complexion! It’s just slightly dark for me so I cover with a super thin layer of a lighter CC cream. This oil of Olay CC cream is awesome and I will be using it for now on!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Caused extreme red rash on my face two days ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past, however, this new bottle caused my face to itch & turn extremely red from forehead to chin. Used calming face wash & moisturizer to take it off & treat my shin, but it still itches two days later. I will be calling the manufacturing company to complain.
customer_reviews.author: DLBill

customer_reviews.title: Tone corrector
customer_reviews.text: The SPF is too low and it says light to medium for the tone but for fair skin it comes out way too dark. I'm sure the product will work well for others but unfortunately for me, I won't be reordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Fdd

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this product because it was a moisturizer with sunscreen. After only a couple of days I noticed sun spots I had for some time started fading and after only a few weeks they were gone. I used to purchase it at my corner drug store until it occurred to me I could probably get a better price on Amazon... sure enough, it's half the price!
customer_reviews.author: CRose

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this stuff! I have gotten so many compliments on my skin just since starting to wear this. I’m almost 30, don’t really wear makeup and am trying to take better care of my skin so I started wearing this and love it! It’s very light weight so I still don’t feel like I have anything on which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still the best for my dry skin - Love  it!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many different brands of makeup and I always come back to this one. It just works better than anything else I've tried. It doesn't settle in fine lines and it never looks cakey or fake. The light color is great in the winter and I usually mix the darker one with it in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: katmac

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with this.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of cc creams an bb creams for the benefits they provide as well as providing slight coverage. This has the worst consistency of any cc cream i've ever used. it dries in frosty gold patches if you don't IMMEDIATELY rub it in. I'm talking a 2 second wait. Now i don't know if i got a bad egg, but this is immediately going in the trash. What a waste. Sticking with asian CC creams and bb creams from now on. They provide the best coverage and consistency imo
customer_reviews.author: ayh210

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: No scent, love this for everyday light coverage. The tint is darker than expected. I’m tan right now and I still think it’s a little orange, I’ve been squirting a little into my lotion to dilute the color. Overall really like this product and will continue to use for everyday light wear
customer_reviews.author: Scout Parsch

customer_reviews.title: Great cream.
customer_reviews.text: this is wonderful cream, Your skin feels great when applied. My problem with it is that it should have more sun protection stronger than 15 for those of us who have had skin cancer.
customer_reviews.author: twiggy

customer_reviews.title: Not for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: It might just be me but I don’t notice a difference in how my skin looks. It also leaves my skin feeling oily and the scent isn’t great. It definitely smells like a caked on some liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy P.

customer_reviews.title: I already had some and like it. Good color
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend after she complained about pasty foundations. I already had some and like it. Good color, not heavy, and covers minimally for light wear. I was at a cosmetic counter in a department store with my friend prior to getting this for her and the expensive foundations that the counter person were smearing on her were really awful. I was standing behind the cosmetic person slashing my finger horizontally across my throat behind the other woman's back indicating to my friend NOT to buy that stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer with a bit of color. I use it everyday. Could use with or without foundation. Have used it for years. A must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: N. Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Great for the skin and light color coverage to even out the face.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily for it’s moisturizing effects and to cover aging skin. It is light and doesn’t feel like makeup; doesn’t clog the pores. I don’t need any additional sun protection on the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Dark orange color, but labeled light to medium
customer_reviews.text: I bought the light to medium color, it is la eled as such but so incredibly dark and orange! I usually wear a golden light color foundation in several brands and this looks like a bad spray tan on my face! It also makes my skin pretty shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product due to the description and reviews. I am 65 and my skin has redness and dark spots. The product did not cover either. It probably would be good for people that are younger.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scheve

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and perfect for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Product is light and non greasy. I've tried so many cc creams and they're all heavy and thick. I will never waste my time on trying anything else when I know Olay works!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Not the real stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product. I’ve been using this stuff for years and the color is totally off. Beware!! Unfortunately I’ve been having second thought about buying anymore beauty products on Amazon. Can figure out what’s real or junk from China.
customer_reviews.author: barbara rehm

customer_reviews.title: Great color moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love this total effects, I don't wear much make-up so this is perfect. It covers very nice, not to dark. I have med light skin. I wear it when I go out works just as excepted and it has sunscreen, can't ask for more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Doris M. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other things I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This is my third go with this cream so that pretty much tells you what I think of it! It goes on lightly and smoothly and looks very natural. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: kathye58

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR LIGHT SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Overall a pretty good cream. However, if you have ‘light’ skin, this is not for you. It says light to medium but this is tan to medium at best. It make me look like a Cheeto. Gave it to my Greek sister in law and the color was perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Azurin

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I wish they still carried the light ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I wish they still carried the light color, but this is not too dark. It moisturizes and provides some sunscreen and a little color. Not to heavy and does not streak.
customer_reviews.author: P E

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Covers but Smells
customer_reviews.text: I can smell this all day when I wear it. It isn't a bad smell but I didn't like it being there all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Smith

customer_reviews.title: It covers very well being light , not dense
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great, it moisturizes, has a good coverage, it has sun protection and the prize is very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Gladys de Obregon

customer_reviews.title: Alas, a great tinted moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and I love the way it not only moisturizes but gives my face just a hint of outdoor sun!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Zandvliet

customer_reviews.title: My Wife's Order...
customer_reviews.text: She buys this regularly when she runs out. It's her favorite. There will most likely be no changes to her future orders of it.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. I really love it. If I'm just hanging around the house or in the summer this is all I use.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Best for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST makeup I've tried so far. I'm on my third bottle, and still love it! A friend who uses the spray on makeup asked me if I also use it. I told her no, and explained that I get the same effect by putting the Olay cream in the palm of my hand and rubbing my palms together rapidly before applying to my face. This creates an even sheerer coat of makeup -- but it still covers blemishes and evens out my skin tone. It's a bit pricey at full retail, so that's why I buy it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have found in years most days I use it for a base makeup it is that great. I have use Laura Mercier foundation and I still do but only when I want heavy coverage. I have fair to medium skin and alot of makeups tend to turn orange with my complexion but this CC moisturizer is the perfect blend, I hope Olay never stops making this product! Amazon also had a great price several dollars cheaper then the drug store!
customer_reviews.author: G McNalley

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer if you dont mind an orange face.
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer and sun protection. It tends to turn my face a bit orange. I wish there was a wider array of shades.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Just a hint of color
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years and like the hint of color in the moisturizer but could no longer find it in local stores. Was happy to find it on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned this item
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned this product as I thought it was greasy and not great coverage. I would suggest looking at other CC cream products over this one. I love most Oil of Olay products, but this one did not hit the mark.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyB

customer_reviews.title: It works but my skin is shiny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading that CC creams are good for the skin and I like Olay products. My skin took several days to get to used to this product. It feels heavy. I broke out in the first couple of days. I breakout out every once in a while still. My skin gets very shiny in a couple of hours despite using pressed power over the cream. When I workout and wipe my face the towel has the cream on it. I don't think I need something this heavy. I have normal skin with a slightly oily T-zone.
customer_reviews.author: Schnogg Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better price than local drugstore. Have purchased twice.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight moisturizing tinted with sunscreen. Much Better price than local drugstore
customer_reviews.author: Nor Cal

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It makes my foundation go on much smoother and look better in addition to making it so that I need less foundation. It's a good color all by itself and although very light in texture it covers quite well so that sometimes, when I want to look very natural and out-doorsy, I wear it alone, without foundation over it. In addition to all that, the bottle lasts practically forever. I've tried other products like this one but this one is far-and-away better.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Myers

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite light foundation. I use it for everyday. Love the price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary G.

customer_reviews.title: Low coverage, nice feel
customer_reviews.text: The coverage isn't great, but it feels nice and looks natural, maybe too natural.
customer_reviews.author: E. Schott

customer_reviews.title: Too orange, gave it away
customer_reviews.text: I ended up giving away because it was too orange for my skin. It was lightweight, but not for me because of the color. Would be better for someone with more tan skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE,  LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for and an excellent product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Blends great
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for many years. I love how it blends perfectly and gives my face the perfect coverage without other makeup.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and color
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and color. I have a lot of discoloration in my skin, and this gave me a nice smooth even tone.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Love the product and the container!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product and its predecessor for a number of years. I really love it. It goes on very light. I normally use it under a little foundation and it makes the foundation go on really nice. But, sometimes I use it by itself. It provides just a bit of cover and nice moisture. As much as I like the product, I like the container best! Someone should get an award for this amazing delivery method. It's pretty, never a mess, and uses the product to the last drop! No other container comes close!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Evens out skin tones and feels so good
customer_reviews.author: Diane Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has it all
customer_reviews.text: I love this and can’t find it at my store anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping & A++
customer_reviews.text: Color matches great and the product works well. It has more coverage than a tinted moisturizer but less than a foundation so your skin can breathe and feel hydrated yet have an even complexion. Wish they didn't discontinue in the stores nearby me, so I will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dannigiirl

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Definitely moisturizes your skin and protects it from the sun. But it leaves a greasy residue on face and makes it look so oily.
customer_reviews.author: Hug life

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Color was a bit lighter than expected but worked out fine. Sun protection and moisturizer too
customer_reviews.author: Jonim3

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know what is wrong with this product this time!!
customer_reviews.text: I use to use this product but this time it turned my skin orange!! It is terrible!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. I don't want to feel like I am wearing stuff on my face and this applies wonderful. I moisturize and then put this on right after, so it is smooths right on.
customer_reviews.author: *Purplestorm

customer_reviews.title: Using for years
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday. Has sunscreen in it which I feel makes this worth the money. Most sunscreens are heavy and smell bad. This is perfect for ladies that don't like the heaviness of makeup. No-this is not a cover up so if you are looking to cover up something this wont work. Just perks up the face with sheer moisture and hint of color.
customer_reviews.author: jewelz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this product! It goes on like moisturizer and it helps blend the foundation smoothly. I have found my forever foundation..
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: A must buy.
customer_reviews.text: I will buy again. Gives coverage without looking over made up.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Flordia

customer_reviews.title: Good product for someone...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this product and give it a try since I naturally look flush and have issues with large pores I was hoping this would give me a more even tone. I tried some out on my neck right away and I loved the color. Today was the first time I put it on my face and boy did it get warm. My face turned very red and very warm. I had to wash it off and even that hurt. Unfortunately this product did not work for me but that doesn't mean it won't work for someone else. I will just keep using my aveeno positively radiant tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this CC cream one bit
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this CC cream one bit. It's cakey feeling and if you have even the slightest dry skin, it will make it worse and you'll see peeling skin through this makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi_Master14

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizing tented cream is no longer being sold in the stores I go to. When I found it online I jumped at the chance to purchase it. I should order more before it is gone forever. I like how it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Charry

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and is very light feeling Good coverage with the tint and sunscreen as well
customer_reviews.author: susan britts

customer_reviews.title: No scent; Not full coverage
customer_reviews.text: No scent. Helped my flaky skin finally obtain some moisture! This is not a full coverage foundation.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it’s lighter than normal foundation, with great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: J. Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: It really evened out the color on my face
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a moisturizer and sunscreen under my Foundation
customer_reviews.author: Linda from PT

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great in place of makeup this is light and covers skin flawless.
customer_reviews.author: LACRYSTAL W.

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: love this product, I did a microdermabrasion, and a chemical peel, got rid of some age spots, and discoloration due to sun exposure, then used this product, it is amazing, great skin tone, not noticeable at all, blends perfectly, plus has spf, love it
customer_reviews.author: Vegas65

customer_reviews.title: Another of those products I love.
customer_reviews.text: It is a moisturizer and tint in one great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth E. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great Feel and Texture
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day - I love its feel and look. A real winner for this 63 year old woman!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Im 42 and love this cc cream
customer_reviews.text: Im 42 and love this cc cream ! I have tryed many other brands and by far this is the best. I don't use any foundation and this also goes on perfect with all my face serums and mosturizers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: Darker than expected and it made my face looked flushed/reddish.
customer_reviews.author: Yeni Pettis

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lotion. Super sheer and light; offers the perfect amount of coverage. If you don’t want to spend a ton, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Jude & Shelly Becker

customer_reviews.title: A product that actually works! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works as promised. Light & Lovely. Does look nice and feels lightweight and airy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Yildiz Molyneaux

product_meta.title: Olay Total Effects Tone Correcting CC Cream with Sunscreen SPF 15, 1.7 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Color:Light To MediumOlay Total Effects Tone Correcting Moisturizer offers you an advanced CC Cream formulated to fight 7 signs of aging – like uneven tone, age spots and wrinkles – while providing instant coverage for flawlessly beautiful skin. CC for yourself. Just apply Total Effects Tone Correcting Moisturizer liberally and blend evenly with your fingertips for instant coverage that reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and discoloration. This hardworking CC Cream also provides nourishing moisturization and includes a broad-spectrum SPF 15 sunscreen to protect your skin from exposure to the sun's harmful rays. Use Olay CC Cream alone or layered under your favorite foundation for even better coverage. ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: AVOBENZONE 2.0%, OCTISALATE 3.0%, OCTOCRYLENE 3.0% INGREDIENTS: WATER, GLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE*, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, ISOPROPYL LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, ACETYL GLUCOSAMINE, PANTHENOL**, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE***, DIMETHICONE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, DIMETHICONOL, C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, CETEARYL GLUCOSIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, LAURETH-7, STEARYL ALCOHOL, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, CETYL ALCOHOL, CARBOMER, POLYACRYLAMIDE, AMINOMETHYL PROPANOL, CITRIC ACID, PEG-100 STEARATE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, IRON OXIDES

BRAND STORY
By Olay

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Olay Total Effects Tone Correcting Moisturizer offers you an advanced CC Cream formulated to fight seven signs of aging – like uneven tone, age spots, and wrinkles – while providing instant coverage for flawlessly beautiful skin.

CC for yourself. Just apply Total Effects Tone Correcting Moisturizer liberally and blend evenly with your fingertips for instant coverage that reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and discoloration. This hardworking CC Cream also provides nourishing moisturization and includes a broad-spectrum SPF 15 sunscreen to protect your skin from exposure to the sun's harmful rays.

Use Olay CC Cream alone or layered under your favorite foundation for even better coverage.

KEY FEATURES
 * Instant skin-perfecting coverage and correction
 * Broad Spectrum SPF 15
 * For Light to Medium skin tones
 * Fights seven signs of aging, including uneven tone, age spots, and dull skin

FIND YOUR SHADE
Olay CC Cream is available in three shades:

 * Fair to Light: For skin with ivory or peach tones
 * Light to Medium: For skin with light beige or sandy tones
 * Medium to Deep: For skin with honey or caramel tones

Each shade of Olay CC Cream is designed to blend in with your natural skin tone. All you need is a pump or two for instant, flawless coverage that fights seven signs of aging.

RESULTS: COMPLETE COVERAGE
Olay CC Cream combines anti-aging and beauty balm to color and correct in one simple step.

CC THE DIFFERENCE
 1. Reduces appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
 2. Balances and helps even out skin tone
 3. Reduces appearance of age spots
 4. Improves surface cell turnover with gentle exfoliation
 5. Provides nourishing moisturization to prevent dryness
 6. Strengthens skin’s natural defense against moisture loss
 7. Recaptures youthful luminosity

GET THE TOTAL EFFECT
Reveal your most beautiful skin in just three steps. Combine Total Effects cleansers, moisturizers, and treatments to more effectively fight seven signs of aging.

Step 1: Cleanser
Gently cleanse away impurities

Step 2: Moisturizer
Firm and hydrate skin with seven anti-aging benefits in every moisturizer

Step 3: Treatment
Add a boost to your routine by targeting specific skincare concerns

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Is Olay Total Effects CC Cream superior to BB Creams?
Olay CC Creams work harder than BB Creams because they do more than just provide instant coverage and SPF protection. Olay CC Creams also offer longer-term correction benefits, helping to fight the seven signs of aging over time.

What level of coverage does Total Effects CC Cream deliver?
Total Effects CC Cream is in between a tinted moisturizer and foundation. It provides more sheer coverage than foundation, so it can be used to replace or in addition to foundation.



See more
feature_bullets: CC CREAM WITH SPF: This CC cream gives you light foundation coverage while it nourishes, hydrates, and protects you from sun damage
LIGHT FEEL: This formula absorbs fast and won't leave you feeling greasy
NOURISHMENT: We've packed this formula with 7 vitamins and antioxidants including VitaNiacin Complex II, Vitamin B3, and many more for nourished, healthy-looking skin
MOISTURIZE WITH FOUNDATION: After cleansing and treatments, use this cream as both your moisturizer and foundation
HEALTHY-LOOKING RADIANCE: Instantly brightens and visibly evens tone
SEVEN HEAVENLY BENEFITS: Our total Effects cleansers clean, refresh, brighten, purify, soften, minimize the look of pores, and visibly smooth your skin
